name: Compromise of a Network Perimeter Device – Qualification
description:
# 🌐 Compromise of a Network Perimeter Device – Qualification

---

## 🎯 Purpose

Confirm the compromise or mere presence of a vulnerability in order to:

* Define the scope
* Assess the impact
* Determine urgency
* Prepare containment actions

---

## ⚙️ Prerequisites

* 👥 **Required personnel**: access to system administration and monitoring, perimeter and security devices, knowledge of business priorities, emergency contact directory.

  * Internal or external resources, managed service provider available if needed.

* 📝 **Actions already undertaken**: list past interventions and begin recording them in the incident log.

---

## 📌 Objectives

1. Confirm compromise of the network device
2. Assess the scope of the incident
3. Measure the impact of the incident
4. Determine the urgency to resolve the incident

---

## 📄 Resource

👉 [Full reflex sheet – PDF](https://www.intercert-france.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/fichereflexe-compromissionequipementbordurereseau-qualification.pdf)

tasks.title: Measure 2 - Assess the scope
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Map the **affected zones** and the **associated accesses**

### 📌 Actions

* Determine the compromise level of the device (admin access compromised? privileged accounts?)
* Determine the attacker’s network access
* Identify secrets stored on the network device that allow direct access to the IS
* Determine if other devices are at risk

### ✅ Deliverables

* Scope assessed and documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 4 - Assess urgency
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Evaluate the immediate severity of the compromise to decide the speed and level of response required.

---

### 📌 Actions

* Risk of privilege escalation / rapid spread?
* Ease of evicting the attacker

---

### ✅ Deliverables

* List of threatened vital activities
* Assessment of privileges held by the attacker
* Documented conclusion on the urgency level in the incident TheHive

tasks.title: Measure 3 - Assess the impact
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Qualify **business** impacts.

### 📌 Actions

* Assess impacts on the IS
* Assess impacts on business activities
* Check if vital activities are disrupted
* Assess internal capabilities to reinstall/correct

### ✅ Deliverables

* Impact determined and documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 1 - Confirm the compromise
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Differentiate compromise vs unpatched vulnerability.

### 📌 Actions

* Identify the **suspect device** (public IP, hostname)
* Search for **traces** of compromise in network/system logs, exploitation indicators
* Confirm the compromise of the network device

### ✅ Deliverables

* Compromise confirmed or not
* Add observables not present in the incident
* Record the investigations performed in the **activities** of this task
